com.mobilerq.android.sdk

Class MrqSlotView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.mobilerq.android.sdk.MrqContentView
            • com.mobilerq.android.sdk.MrqSlotView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, MrqSdk.OnContentUpdateListener

    public class MrqSlotView
extends MrqContentView
implements MrqSdk.OnContentUpdateListener
    A View that displays a single piece of content for a slot. The content is scaled to fit the entire view and scrolling is disabled. This is a MrqSdk.OnContentUpdateListener and will update content as necessary when MrqSdk.refresh() is called. Views are tracked by calling MrqSdk.trackContentView(Context, MrqContent). Clicks are tracked by calling MrqSdk.trackContentClick(Context, MrqContent).

    You must add xmlns:mrq="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" to your layout XML before attributes will work.

    XML Attributes
    mrq:slot_name - the slot name (default is no slot)
    mrq:load_animation_enabled - enabled loading animation (default is true)
    Example layout for a slot named "hero"
    <com.mobilerq.android.sdk.MrqSlotView
     xmlns:mrq="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
     android:id="@+id/slotView"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent"
     mrq:slot_name="hero" />

      • DEFAULT_ON_MRQ_CONTENT_CLICK_LISTENER

        public static final MrqSlotView.OnContentClickListener DEFAULT_ON_MRQ_CONTENT_CLICK_LISTENER
        Default MrqContentView click handler implementation. Opens MrqContent.getCreativeUrl() in the web browser.

        attrs - the attributes
        defStyle - the def style
